nodes.text: Genuinely shocked at the number of people commenting that this is ok. \n\nDoesn’t matter if I agree with her or not. She’s a serving police officer in uniform, on duty! It can’t only be ok when it’s a cause you believe in: our police must remain non political. @WeAreFairCop https://t.co/dyInap0BIr
@redney71 @Unbridl09298089 @WeAreFairCop It’s not Ok and she should be formally reprimanded.

@pepetideo @WeAreFairCop She has a right to an opinion in her own time, she’s clearly on duty here. Would all citizens in our community be comfortable approaching her for help if needed if they saw this? I doubt it. This is ok by you because you happen to agree with her, on the next issue you may not.

@redney71 @WeAreFairCop Not really. Pretending police officers do not have their own thought and biases is simply that... An illusion. I happen to think Israel is commiting war crimes ... Would that stop me from engaging with people that don't agree with me? I hope not.

@redney71 @WeAreFairCop She has a right to an opinion.  In this case , by showing support if she can get people to respect her and follow her orders - Why not?\nShe is not advocating for a political party, she is asking for a free Palestine.\nWould it be wrong if she shouted "end racism!" ?

@Nettleshippy @redney71 @WeAreFairCop Then they need to discipline every officer around the UK who took the knee. Do you believe they will do that? I don’t therefore this officer should not be made a scapegoat.
@redney71 @Philosophy_the @WeAreFairCop Can’t even wear her mask properly.
@redney71 @Philosophy_the @WeAreFairCop She’ll be front and centre today and on the beat in Siberia tomorrow if she still has a job. Clown.
@redney71 @WeAreFairCop When the police took the knee to BLM they set this precedent. They need to reset their policies then start again not discipline this officer.

@redney71 @WeAreFairCop Yes it's deeply depressing how many people don't understand how a liberal democracy works and the importance of impartial organs of the state. As long as they agree with the sentiment shown and it makes them feel good, they think it's fine

@redney71 @WeAreFairCop She showed emotion in reaction to genocide. She’s a human being. I’m honestly more appalled by those not moved by the ethnic cleansing and genocide of the Palestinians happening before our very eyes.
@redney71 @WeAreFairCop If this officer were racist she would assault Blacks in the back of the van.  Do police ever hate-crime their own? Shocked to realise I don't know.  But I suspect they don't.
